name: hash
description: Hash value associated with the record

name: account_id
description: Account identifier associated with the record

name: market_id
description: Market identifier related to the record

name: asset_id
description: Asset identifier for the asset involved in the transaction

name: asset_name
description: Name of the asset involved in the transaction

name: position_id
description: Position identifier that combines account, market, and other relevant details

name: amount
description: The amount of the asset in its smallest unit

name: amountUSD
description: The amount of the asset converted into USD

name: block_timestamp
description: Block timestamp when the record was created
